PARAMETERS.name: WAGE
PARAMETERS.LaTeX: \begin{align*} WAGE_{1,\text{Monday}} &= 6 \\ WAGE_{1,\text{Tuesday}} &= 0 \\ WAGE_{1,\text{Wednesday}} &= 6 \\ WAGE_{1,\text{Thursday}} &= 0 \\ WAGE_{1,\text{Friday}} &= 7 \\ WAGE_{2,\text{Monday}} &= 0 \\ WAGE_{2,\text{Tuesday}} &= 8 \\ WAGE_{2,\text{Wednesday}} &= 9 \\ WAGE_{2,\text{Thursday}} &= 5 \\ WAGE_{2,\text{Friday}} &= 0 \\ WAGE_{3,\text{Monday}} &= 4 \\ WAGE_{3,\text{Tuesday}} &= 8 \\ WAGE_{3,\text{Wednesday}} &= 3 \\ WAGE_{3,\text{Thursday}} &= 0 \\ WAGE_{3,\text{Friday}} &= 5 \\ WAGE_{4,\text{Monday}} &= 5 \\ WAGE_{4,\text{Tuesday}} &= 5 \\ WAGE_{4,\text{Wednesday}} &= 6 \\ WAGE_{4,\text{Thursday}} &= 0 \\ WAGE_{4,\text{Friday}} &= 4 \\ WAGE_{5,\text{Monday}} &= 3 \\ WAGE_{5,\text{Tuesday}} &= 0 \\ WAGE_{5,\text{Wednesday}} &= 5 \\ WAGE_{5,\text{Thursday}} &= 8 \\ WAGE_{5,\text{Friday}} &= 0 \\ WAGE_{6,\text{Monday}} &= 0 \\ WAGE_{6,\text{Tuesday}} &= 6 \\ WAGE_{6,\text{Wednesday}} &= 0 \\ WAGE_{6,\text{Thursday}} &= 6 \\ WAGE_{6,\text{Friday}} &= 5 \end{align*}

PARAMETERS.name: MIN_HOURS_UNDERGRADUATES
PARAMETERS.query: Minimum hours undergraduates must work per week

PARAMETERS.name: MIN_HOURS_GRADUATE_STUDENTS
PARAMETERS.query: Minimum hours graduate students must work per week

PARAMETERS.query: Maximum hours any student can work per week

PARAMETERS.name: MAX_STUDENTS_PER_DAY
PARAMETERS.query: Maximum number of students that can be scheduled for duty each day

PARAMETERS.name: TOTAL_DUTY_HOURS
PARAMETERS.query: Total duty hours for all students

PARAMETERS.name: MAX_HOURS_5_AND_6
PARAMETERS.query: Maximum combined hours graduate students can work per week

PARAMETERS.query: Maximum hours student 5 can work on Thursday
